Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Residenze Ca' Alberti - Ca' del Borgo in Venice (Lido of Venice), you'll be close to Circolo Golf Venezia Alberoni and Venice Convention Center. This 4-star residence is within the vicinity of Santa Maria Elisabetta Waterbus and Lido Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 8 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Tempur-Pedic bed. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Beaux Arts residence also features babysitting/childcare (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and shopping on site.

Dining
Take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, express check-in, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 1:30 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Residenze Ca' Alberti - Ca' del Borgo in Venice (Lido of Venice), you'll be close to Circolo Golf Venezia Alberoni and Venice Convention Center. This 4-star residence is within the vicinity of Santa Maria Elisabetta Waterbus and Lido Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Circolo Golf Venezia Alberoni - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Venice Convention Center - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Santa Maria Elisabetta Waterbus - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Lido Beach - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Church of the Most Holy Redeemer - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Parco delle Rimembranze - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Church of San Giorgio Maggiore - 6.4 km / 3.9 mi
I Gesuati - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Giardini Pubblici - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Punta della Dogana - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Giardini della Biennale - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Basilica of St Mary of Health - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Peggy Guggenheim Museum - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Palazzo Venier dei Leoni - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Squero di San Trovaso - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi

The preferred airport for Residenze Ca' Alberti - Ca' del Borgo is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
